Who am I?

I am a dedicated student studying Computer Science at Simon Fraser University. My interest in computers began in elementary school when I put a cheap graphics card in my Dad's old work computer to play games, since then I have been fascinated with computers and how they work. Here you can find my contact info, some of my qualifications, work experience, qualifications, projects and learn a bit more about me.
